about_the_game:
Slender - A Crooked Manifestation is a First Person Perspective, Single-Player survival horror game, where the line between reality and nightmare blurs. After being caught in a violent ocean storm, you wash ashore a desolate island that holds the remnants of a forgotten past.

As a lone survivor navigating the haunting environment of treacherous islands and dark caves, you’ll uncover dark secrets and face the terror lurking in the shadows. Your mission? Survive long enough to discover the island's terrible truth by finding a lost companion from your past and escape. But beware, the malevolent force that seeks to trap you is not far behind. Will you last long enough without becoming the next victim of Slenderman?

Key Features of the Demo

  • Atmospheric Survival Horror: A first-person experience that combines survival mechanics with psychological terror. Prepare for relentless tension as you scavenge, explore, and fight to survive against the unknown forces hunting you. Demo version includes the first 2 levels which will give players a taste of what is to come.

  • Strategic Stealth Mechanics: The more you’re seen, the greater the danger. Hide in the dense forest, crouch through the island's decaying ruins, and avoid detection as you solve puzzles and manage limited resources to stay alive. Demo will introduce the players to most of the mechanics and get the players up to speed for the full version.

  • Terrifying Encounters: Face an evolving, omnipresent horror that can strike from anywhere. With each passing night, the Slenderman grows stronger, and your survival becomes even more perilous.

What is included in the Demo?

Demo version includes the first 2 levels which will give players a taste of what is to come. It will also introduce the players to most of the mechanics and get the players up to speed for the full version. With almost an hour worth of gameplay, we feel that playing the Demo will prepare the players for the world of Slender - A Crooked Manifestation.

WARNING: PHOTOSENSITIVITY/EPILEPSY SEIZURES (READ THIS NOTICE BEFORE PLAYING)

A very small percentage of people may experience epileptic seizures or blackouts when exposed to certain kinds of flashing lights or light patterns. These persons, or even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy, may experience epileptic symptoms or seizures while playing video games. If you or any of your relatives has an epileptic condition or has had seizures of any kind, consult your physician before playing any video game.

IMMEDIATELY DISCONTINUE use and consult a physician if you or your child experience any of the following symptoms: dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitching, involuntary movements, loss of awareness, disorientation, or convulsions. Parents should watch for or ask their children about the above symptoms.

Join the Community

Follow us on our social media channels for the latest updates, sneak peeks, and behind-the-scenes content as we prepare for the full release of Slender: A Crooked Manifestation. Join our community of horror enthusiasts and share your survival stories!

Wishlist Now!

Don’t miss your chance to embark on this terrifying journey. Wishlist Slender: A Crooked Manifestation now and be among the first to experience the horror!

short_description: Slender: A Crooked Manifestation is a first person survival horror game, where players explore treacherous islands and eerie caves after a stormy shipwreck. Navigate and evade relentless threats, all while uncovering the chilling secrets that lie within. Survival is your only goal - if you can.
